review: Immediately uplifted my "dumb" tv set to smart after a couple of minutes configuring the wifi access. It works pretty fine casting YouTube, Netflix and TuneIn from my Android device (Samsung Galaxy S6) and from an iMac (OS X Yosemite) using Chrome with the Google Cast Chrome extension. For casting local videos in my iMac I use VideoStream for Google Chromecast (Chrome app).
author: Andrés Meza

review: Very handy and portable and great quality for the price.Note: Use the strap to make sure gravity doesn't mess up streaming the video.
author: Michael W.

review: Does not work with Vista OS
author: froggy47 "froggy47"

review: Save your money and buy Apple TV or something else. This is garbage! I have gone around and around on the internet trying to trouble shoot this device. On my TV all I get is an error message telling me I am connected to the internet but cannot access the internet? After looking online for assistance I found several other folks with the same issue. If that many folks are having problems then this is not a very well thought out product. I have reconfigured my router, spent two hours on help lines, searched the internet time and time again and I still cannot get this to work. Not heavy enough for a door stop. JUNK!
author: Father

review: best gadget ive purchased in a long time
author: willow

review: Love it. Use it in my apt were I don't have a box. Also when I go away I take it to watch my cable programs
